body:
scikit-image pinned script to <1.9.2 on conda forge which resulted in some weird differences. Pinning scikit-image to <0.20 for now solves this, https://github.com/conda-forge/scikit-image-feedstock/pull/102 for context. The pin is already gone on main https://github.com/scikit-image/scikit-image/blob/main/pyproject.toml, so will be fixed with the next release.

The package diff is anyone is interested:
```
          Name_base      Name_new Version_base Version_new
114    intel-openmp           NaN     2023.0.0         NaN
144         libblas       libblas        3.9.0       3.9.0
148        libcblas      libcblas        3.9.0       3.9.0
158        libhwloc           NaN        2.9.0         NaN
161       liblapack     liblapack        3.9.0       3.9.0
173         libxml2           NaN       2.10.4         NaN
188             mkl           NaN     2022.1.0         NaN
204         numexpr       numexpr        2.7.3       2.8.4
227           pooch           NaN        1.7.0         NaN
233  pthreads-win32           NaN        2.9.1         NaN
277    scikit-image  scikit-image       0.20.0      0.20.0
279           scipy         scipy       1.10.1       1.9.1
290             tbb           NaN     2021.8.0         NaN
343             NaN      libflang          NaN       5.0.0
344             NaN   libopenblas          NaN      0.3.21
345             NaN     llvm-meta          NaN       5.0.0
346             NaN         nomkl          NaN         1.0
347             NaN        openmp          NaN       5.0.0
```
